------- Original message -------
From: Ray Ormond (b)(6): (b)(6)@bop.gov
Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6): (b)(6)@bop.gov
Subject: Re: Epstein

>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>
Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will nec

>> "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6): (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov 07/23/2019 11:12 >>
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

>> "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" (b)(6): (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The content is related to an individual named Epstein and discussions around his status and plans for transfer.
